paragraph: Maryam Alqatan (Arabic: مريم القطان; born June 28, 1969), better known as Shemayel (Arabic: شمايل), is a retired Kuwaiti singer and actress. She started a singing and acting career in 1998 which continued until 2003, when she became an Islamic preacher.
Kaser alzejaj (English: Broke The Glass) (1999, alnibras/alkheyol)
Katheb o sadeg (English: Lies and Truth) (2000, Rotana)
Mahad tharbkom ala edekom (English: Nobody Hit Your Hand) (2003, Rotana); Unreleased
